item.title: Netflix's New Time Travel Horror Movie Is A Great Reminder To Watch Kiernan Shipka's 87% RT Slasher From Last Year
item.description: A new time travel movie on Netflix serves as the perfect reminder to check out Kiernan Shipka's one-year-old slasher that boasts an 87% RT score.

item.title: 10 Best Japanese Horror Movies
item.description: Japan has cemented itself as an amazing producer of horror films, with many classics that stand the test of time, like Ringu, House, and Kwaidan.

item.title: George Lucas' Revenge Of The Sith Changes Completely Destroyed Padme's Character & Story
item.description: Deleted scenes from Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith reveal how much better Padme Amidala's Star Wars story could have been.
